name: Pillars (Gamanko)
description:
Pillars

A small puzzle game made for the Bevy game jam #3

Help the climbers to reach the top of the pillar, to power the pylons.

The prototype definitely needs a few more puzzle mechanics and some additional stages.

Controls

- Hold left click to rotate

- Press Space to restart the level

Targets support & known issues

- Wasm target tested in Firefox.

- Rotation does not seem to work on mobile
